intro: Megalastrum dorsoglabrum, commonly known as the smooth-stemmed megalastrum, is a species of flowering plant native to the arid regions of southern Africa. Megalastrum dorsoglabrum is often found in rocky outcrops and sandy soils, where it thrives in full sun.
